name: Uncontrollably Wobbley Invasions Demo
description:
A 3rd person physics based pitch invasion game in which you play as the pitch invader and commit mischief on the guard and the players. This is a demo for the game and the game is still in developement.

Team: - 

Me (Lead designer and developer)

Michael Kioko (Character animator)

Daniel Loutfi (3D artist)
